医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 的影响范围很广：一些身体症状可能会在诊断后持续两年研究人员根据急性 COVID-19 诊断两年后的严重程度调查了躯体症状的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/COVID-19e28099s-long-reach-Some-physical-symptoms-can-persist-up-to-two-years-post-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/COVID-19e28099s-long-reach-Some-physical-symptoms-can-persist-up-to-two-years-post-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da5e8a15-6fff-44cb-a308-ad98134463cf Tue, 31 Oct 2023 05:55:00 -0400 COVID-19’s long reach: Some physical symptoms can persist up to two years post-diagnosis
防晒霜悖论：阳光照射程度较高的人使用较多但用量不足的防晒霜研究人员调查了导致加拿大大西洋省份黑色素瘤发病率不同的变量，以加深对参与者对阳光照射的态度的了解，并为与 CM 预防相关的公共卫生指南提供信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/The-sunscreen-paradox-individuals-with-higher-levels-of-sun-exposure-use-more-but-not-an-adequate-quantity- of-sunscreen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/The-sunscreen-paradox-individuals-with-higher-levels-of-sun-exposure-use-more-but-not-an-adequate-quantity- of-sunscreen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b61f2e89-657f-4c0b-b6c3-517d105bfd08 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 05:31:00 -0400 The sunscreen paradox: individuals with higher levels of sun exposure use more but not an adequate quantity of sunscreen
Axon 生物学与药物发现的未来：与 Federico Dajas-Bailador 博士深入探讨News-Medical 采访了轴突生物学和药物发现领域的领先专家 Federico Dajas-Bailador 博士。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Axon-Biology-The-Future-of-Drug-Discovery-A-Deep-Dive-with-Dr-Federico-Dajas-Bailador.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Axon-Biology-The-Future-of-Drug-Discovery-A-Deep-Dive-with-Dr-Federico-Dajas-Bailador.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdb659f4-8a59-4977-adf5-a56c0175b3fd Tue, 31 Oct 2023 04:37:00 -0400 Axon Biology & The Future of Drug Discovery: A Deep Dive with Dr Federico Dajas-Bailador
墨尔本大学学生为脑瘫儿童开发定制视频游戏控制器患有脑瘫 (CP) 的 7 岁男孩杰罗姆 (Jerome) 在墨尔本大学生物医学工程硕士生团队的帮助下，第一次能够玩电子游戏，他们共同设计了一款游戏和他一起定制视频游戏控制器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/University-of-Melbourne-students-develop-customized-video-game-controller-for-kid-with-cerebral-palsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/University-of-Melbourne-students-develop-customized-video-game-controller-for-kid-with-cerebral-palsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29c11897-bcd7-4a84-a95c-ccd20187590c Tue, 31 Oct 2023 03:01:00 -0400 University of Melbourne students develop customized video game controller for kid with cerebral palsy
虚拟会议期间的困倦可能是精神负荷不足和无聊的结果新的研究表明，虚拟会议期间的困倦是由精神负荷不足和无聊引起的。早期的研究表明，虚拟会议带来的疲劳源于精神负荷过重，但阿尔托大学的新研究表明，虚拟会议期间的困倦实际上可能是精神负荷不足和无聊的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Sleepiness-during-virtual-meetings-may-be-the-result-of-mental-underload-and-boredom.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Sleepiness-during-virtual-meetings-may-be-the-result-of-mental-underload-and-boredom.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f39e986-d465-4745-a320-f02a9da09f91 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 02:57:00 -0400 Sleepiness during virtual meetings may be the result of mental underload and boredom
南澳大学寻求公众支持致命脑癌的重要研究南澳大利亚大学正在寻求公众对重要脑癌研究的支持，该研究可能会挽救数百人的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/UniSA-seeks-public-support-for-vital-research-on-deadly-brain-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/UniSA-seeks-public-support-for-vital-research-on-deadly-brain-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d970be65-d99d-437f-960a-d84f993b7cf9 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 02:45:00 -0400 UniSA seeks public support for vital research on deadly brain cancers
Broken String Biosciences 的 INDUCE-seq 平台展示了 DNA 结构变化对 CRISPR-Cas9 基因编辑特异性的影响Broken String Biosciences 今天宣布，其 INDUCE-seq™ DNA 断裂图谱技术已在同行评审的研究论文中使用，以表征 DNA 拓扑变化导致的 CRISPR-Cas9 基因编辑的脱靶效应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Broken-String-Biosciencese28099-INDUCE-seq-platform-demonstrates-impact-of-structural-DNA-changes-on-speciality-of-CRISPR-Cas9-基因编辑.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Broken-String-Biosciencese28099-INDUCE-seq-platform-demonstrates-impact-of-structural-DNA-changes-on-speciality-of-CRISPR-Cas9-基因编辑.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f94cb9f-aba7-42c5-b511-dc6de6465e28 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 02:17:00 -0400 Broken String Biosciences’ INDUCE-seq platform demonstrates impact of structural DNA changes on specificity of CRISPR-Cas9 gene editing
新研究确定了帕金森病的区域热点巴罗神经学研究所的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与生活在空气污染水平最低地区的人相比，生活在空气污染中等水平地区的人患帕金森病的风险高出 56%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-study-identizes-regional-hotspots-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-study-identizes-regional-hotspots-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20938cad-5040-41b1-9aa1-daa6d208ae18 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 23:57:00 -0400 New study identifies regional hotspots for Parkinson's disease
辛辛那提大学将在未来五年领导 NIH StrokeNet辛辛那提大学和 UC Health 已更新为美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) StrokeNet 国家协调中心，该中心是 NIH 资助的多中心中风试验的主要基础设施，也是成人和儿童新的潜在治疗方法的管道患有中风和有中风风险的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/University-of-Cincinnati-to-lead-NIH-StrokeNet-for-next- Five-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/University-of-Cincinnati-to-lead-NIH-StrokeNet-for-next- Five-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a14a93a-f30c-4cee-a880-ce346563de92 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 23:16:54 -0400 University of Cincinnati to lead NIH StrokeNet for next five years
熬夜和不吃早餐会增加患心脏病的风险，尤其是男性一项大规模研究表明，不吃早餐的晚睡者患代谢综合征和心血管疾病的风险较高，尤其是男性。影响因年龄和性别而异，表明睡眠模式、饮食习惯和心脏健康之间存在复杂的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Late-nights-and-skipping-breakfast-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk-special-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Late-nights-and-skipping-breakfast-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk-special-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edcbf548-244f-406c-a959-ac3c5c76aea1 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 23:14:00 -0400 Late nights and skipping breakfast linked to increased heart disease risk, especially in men
